channel.title: Again another sword
channel.description:
I made one more sword. Colourless, not textured. And yes, the handle is shorter than the sword i made before.
Pictures:
[URL=http://img21.imageshack.us/i/picture1jgzp.png/][IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/789/picture1jgzp.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img190.imageshack.us/i/picture2nsl.png/][IMG]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/4286/picture2nsl.th.png[/img][/URL]
What do you think about it?

item.title: Again another sword
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:9, topic:379467”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=475310.msg3475825#msg3475825 date=1295702082]

Added new picture. Maybe it still looks the same, but it isn’t. Lol. Scaled it a bit down.

did oyu just make the whole sword smaller O.o?

No, lol. I made that spiky thing smaller, played a bit with the handle and made the blade a bit longer.

they still like pretty big
[/quote]
$#@$ Well, I really am not in the mood to change them, take pictures and wait 30 minutes for imageshack to load, lol.[/quote]

ah k lol dont post the pic after your done but just move the spikes in alittle more so you can thin them out like their sides move them closer together and yer

Read full topic

uhh well i can see the prims and all… but those handle spikes are just alittle too big… it looks like if you pick it up your arm will fall off… nice work though try thin them out (the spikes)

awesome post another pic after you update it
